description:
- Added palm mutes to the Rhythm guitar and fixed multiple sections
- Made corrects to the Bass matching the Rhythm guitar
- Made position changes to Jason's main lead
- Made multiple corrections to Jason's Lead (based on Jeff Loomis's cover)
- Corrected the type of harmonies and removed certain areas where no harmony exists
- Corrected a significant amount of the Drum track
- Added markers
- Removed StefanKalik's error report as I changed that part of the measure
title: Perpetual Burn

description: seems like the notes are wrong, lost all backing tracks.  definitely not an improvement.
title: Perpetual Burn
